A.MANDT ,A.VKGRP||A.TAXNO||A.ERDAT||A.ERZZT AS CON_KEY ,A.VKGRP ,A.VKGRT ,A.ADDRS3 ,A.POSTCD2 ,A.TELNO ,A.FAXNO ,A.TAXNO ,A.KIDNO ,A.KUPJT ,A.ADDRS1||A.ADDRS2 AS ADR ,A.NAME AS NAM ,CASE WHEN A.POSTCD5 != '' THEN A.POSTCD5 ELSE REPLACE(A.POSTCD1, ' ','') END AS POSTCD1 ,DECODE(A.PRIFORM,'5','', A.NOTICE) AS NOTICE ,DECODE(A.PRIFORM,'5',CS710.EMAIL,A.EMAIL) AS EMAIL ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS705.SEQ_GBN,'01',CS705.FKDAT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS705.FKDAT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS705.FKDAT,5,2) ) AS CS705_FKDAT_01 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS707.BNKNM,'³óÇù(³óÇùÁß¾ÓÈ¸)',CS707.BNKNM,''),'') AS CS707_BNKNM_01 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS707.BNKNM,'³óÇù(³óÇùÁß¾ÓÈ¸)',SUBSTR(CS707.BANKVN,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(CS707.BANKVN,5,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(CS707.BANKVN,9,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(CS707.BANKVN,13),''),'') AS CS707_BANKVN_01 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS707.BNKNM,'½ÅÇÑ',CS707.BNKNM,''),'') AS CS707_BNKNM_02 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS707.BNKNM,'½ÅÇÑ',SUBSTR(CS707.BANKVN,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(CS707.BANKVN,5,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(CS707.BANKVN,9,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(CS707.BANKVN,13),''),'') AS CS707_BANKVN_02 ,'' AS CS707_BNKNM_03 ,'' AS CS707_BANKVN_03 ,'' AS CS707_BNKNM_04 ,'' AS CS707_BANKVN_04
,DECODE(VALUE(CS708.GIROAMT ,0),0,'',REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS708.GIROAMT , '$999,999,999'),'$','')) AS CS708_GIROAMT1 ,DECODE(VALUE(CS708.TAXYYMM , ''),'','',SUBSTR(CS708.TAXYYMM,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS708.TAXYYMM,5,2)) AS CS708_TAXYYMM ,VALUE(CS708.KUPJT , '') AS CS708_KUPJT ,VALUE(CS708.INFO3 , '') AS CS708_INFO3 ,VALUE(CS708.TITLINT , '') AS ,VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'02',CS711.BNKNM ,''),'') AS CS711_BNKNM_02 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'02',CS711.BNKNB ,''),'') AS CS711_BNKNB_02 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'02',CS711.TITLINT ,''),'') AS CS711_TITLINT_02 ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'02',CS711.PAYDT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS711.PAYDT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.PAYDT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.PAYDT,7,2) ) AS CS711_PAYDT_02 ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'02',CS711.RECAMT ,0 ),'' ),0,'', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS711.RECAMT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) AS CS711_RECAMT_02 ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'03',CS711.FKDAT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS711.FKDAT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.FKDAT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.FKDAT,7,2) ) AS CS711_FKDAT_03 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'03',CS711.BNKNM ,''),'') AS CS711_BNKNM_03 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'03',CS711.BNKNB ,''),'') AS CS711_BNKNB_03 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'03',CS711.TITLINT ,''),'') AS CS711_TITLINT_03 ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'03',CS711.PAYDT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS711.PAYDT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.PAYDT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.PAYDT,7,2) ) AS CS711_PAYDT_03 ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'03',CS711.RECAMT ,0 ),0 ),0,'', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS711.RECAMT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) AS CS711_RECAMT_03 ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'04',CS711.FKDAT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS711.FKDAT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.FKDAT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.FKDAT,7,2) ) AS CS711_FKDAT_04 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'04',CS711.BNKNM ,''),'') AS CS711_BNKNM_04 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'04',CS711.BNKNB ,''),'') AS CS711_BNKNB_04 ,SUBSTRING(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'04',CS711.TITLINT ,''),''),1,15, CODEUNITS32) AS CS711_TITLINT_04 ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'04',CS711.PAYDT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS711.PAYDT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.PAYDT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS711.PAYDT,7,2) ) AS CS711_PAYDT_04 ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'04',CS711.RECAMT ,0 ),0 ),0,'', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS711.RECAMT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) AS CS711_RECAMT_04 ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS711.SEQ_GBN,'TT',CS711.RECAMT ,0 ),0 ),0,'', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS711.RECAMT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) AS CS711_RECAMT_TT ----Ã»±¸¾È³» ,VALUE(SUBSTR(CS712.TAXCYM,3,4) , '') CS712_TAXCYM ,DECODE(VALUE(CS712.UPAYAMT , 0),0,'',REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS712.UPAYAMT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) CS712_UPAYAMT ,DECODE(VALUE(CS712.BILLAMT , 0),0,'',REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS712.BILLAMT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) CS712_BILLAMT ,DECODE(VALUE(CS712.SUMAMT , 0),0,'',REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS712.SUMAMT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) CS712_SUMAMT ,VALUE(CS712.BNKNM , '') CS712_BNKNM ,VALUE(CS712.BNKNB , '') CS712_BNKNB ,VALUE(DECODE(CS712.PAYDT,'00000000','',SUBSTR(CS712.PAYDT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS712.PAYDT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS712.PAYDT,7,2)),'') AS CS712_PAYDT
--¹Ì³³ ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'01',CS713.FKDAT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,7,2) ) AS CS713_FKDAT_01 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'01',CS713.TITLINT ,''),'') AS CS713_TITLINT_01 ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'01',CS713.AMOUNT , 0), 0),0,'', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS713.AMOUNT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) AS CS713_AMOUNT_01 ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'02',CS713.FKDAT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,7,2) ) AS CS713_FKDAT_02 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'02',CS713.TITLINT ,''),'') AS CS713_TITLINT_02 ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'02',CS713.AMOUNT , 0), 0),0,'', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS713.AMOUNT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) AS CS713_AMOUNT_02 ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'03',CS713.FKDAT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,7,2) ) AS CS713_FKDAT_03 ,VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'03',CS713.TITLINT ,''),'') AS CS713_TITLINT_03 ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'03',CS713.AMOUNT , 0), 0),0,'', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS713.AMOUNT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) AS CS713_AMOUNT_03 ,DECODE(REPLACE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'04',CS713.FKDAT,''),''),'00000000','') ,'','', SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CS713.FKDAT,7,2) ) AS CS713_FKDAT_04 ,SUBSTR(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'04',CS713.TITLINT ,''),''),1,15) AS CS713_TITLINT_04 ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'04',CS713.AMOUNT , 0), 0),0,'', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS713.AMOUNT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) AS CS713_AMOUNT_04 -- ,VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'TT',CS713.TITLINT ,''),'') AS CS713_TITLINT_TT ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'TT',CS713.AMOUNT , 0), 0),0,'', '±âÁØÀÏÀÚ : '||CS713.TITLINT ) AS CS713_TITLINT_TT ,DECODE(VALUE(DECODE(CS713.SEQ_GBN,'TT',CS713.AMOUNT , 0), 0),0,'', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(CS713.AMOUNT , '$999,999,999'),'$','') ) AS CS713_AMOUNT_TT
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST709 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST705 CS705 ON CS705.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS705.TAXNO = A.TAXNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST706 CS706 ON CS706.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS706.TAXNO = A.TAXNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST707 CS707 ON CS707.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS707.TAXNO = A.TAXNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST708 CS708 ON CS708.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS708.TAXNO = A.TAXNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST710 CS710 ON CS710.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS710.TAXNO = A.TAXNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST711 CS711 ON CS711.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS711.TAXNO = A.TAXNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST712 CS712 ON CS712.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS712.TAXNO = A.TAXNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST713 CS713 ON CS713.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS713.TAXNO = A.TAXNO
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.TAXNO = #TAXNO# AND A.CON_KEY = '' ) A
